content: on lhn and knit together through back loop with c1 and size 3 short needle to end of row cut yarn feed end through loop and tighten round 1 k4 yo repeat to eor 165 sts rounds 2 to 6 knit finishing weave in ends and block for best results part 5 fourth increase with c1 and size 3 longer needle round 1 k5 yo repeat to eor 198 sts rounds 2 to 6 knit part 6 fifth increase with c1 and size 3 longer needle round 1 k6 yo repeat to eor 231 sts rounds 2 to 6 knit web https //yarnz2go myshopify com email yarnz2go@gmail com ravelry petrabreakstone © petra breakstone enjoy your project page 2 of 2
